text: Eloy Guerrero Asensio (born March 26, 1962 in Barcelona) is a track and field athlete from Spain. He has a disability and is a T42 type athlete. He raced at the 1976 Summer Paralympics. He came in second in one race. == References == Category:Spanish sprinters Category:Living people Category:1962 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Barcelona Category:1976 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type T42
title: Eloy Guerrero Asensio
